mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.type_name, a.type_desc, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.remarks, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN work_type_type p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_area ar ON ar.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER pp ON pp.id = a.primary_person LEFT JOIN SYS_USER dp ON dp.id = a.deputy_person
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM work_type a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.id

SELECT
FROM work_type a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_type( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, type_name, type_desc, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type_name}, #{type_desc}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE work_type SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, type_name = #{type_name}, type_desc = #{type_desc}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE work_type SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
